name: Amphibious Bugroth MK-11
description: While "Umi" is not on the field, this card gains 700 ATK, also it cannot attack directly. While "Umi" is on the field: You can target 1 face-up non-WATER monster on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Amphibious Bugroth MK-11" once per turn.
